Who were some of the notable fiction writers that HPL regularly corresponded with?
Robert E. Howard (creator of Conan the Barbarian), Clark Ashton Smith (creator of Averoigne and Zothique), and Robert Bloch (later to write Psycho).

How did Clark Ashton Smith and HPL share their ideas?
They carried the sharing of ideas into their fiction, referring to each other's creations in their stories.

The Book of Eibon.
